message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe it's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $900,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,000,000, which still leaves room for both of us to benefit from this deal.  Let's meet in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm not willing to go all the way to $1,000,000.
